Smart Iron: A clothes iron with a built-in AI assistant that can detect the type of fabric being ironed and adjust the heat and steam settings accordingly. The AI can also suggest the best ironing techniques for different fabrics and provide real-time feedback on the ironing progress.

Virtual Ironing Board: A virtual reality platform that allows users to iron their clothes in a virtual environment. Users can upload images of their clothes and iron them virtually, with the platform providing realistic simulations of the ironing process. This can help users improve their ironing skills and reduce the risk of ruining their clothes.

AI-Powered Ironing Station: A clothes iron with a built-in AI that can detect the type of fabric being ironed and automatically adjust the heat and steam settings. The AI can also detect the user's ironing style and provide personalized suggestions for improving their technique.

Automated Ironing System: A fully automated ironing system that uses robotic arms and advanced sensors to detect and iron clothes. The system can automatically detect the type of fabric, adjust the heat and steam settings, and even detect and remove wrinkles.

Smart Ironing App: A mobile app that connects to a user's clothes iron and provides real-time feedback on the ironing progress. The app can detect the type of fabric being ironed and provide personalized suggestions for improving the ironing technique. The app can also track the user's ironing history and provide insights on how to improve their ironing skills over time.
